ygData.subject: Re: Surnames
ygData.msgSnippet: even if you do not see a GM on, send the petition.  the GMs are often invis on /who. Shada Silverleaf, Level 48 Bard, Mithaniel Marr Erisi, Level 6 Paladin,
ygData.messageBody:
even if you do not see a GM on, send the petition. the GMs are often invis
on /who.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 48 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jessica Hankins [mailto:polyhymnia@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 9:48 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Surnames
>
>
> From: Jessica Hankins <polyhymnia@...>
>
> I've heard it is GMs only that bestow the surnames. Once you
> get the level
> (securely, I might add) petition when you see a GM on, and
> they'll meet you to
> bestow the name.
>
> --
>
> James Schuldes wrote:
>
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > I hear that those names are bestowed by a Guide or GM on
> those who upon
> > reaching their 20th level call for such service. And just
> last night I met
> > someone who chose not to have a surname (cant believe he
> could not find a GM
> > for 13 levels <g>).
>
>
